attributes.action: Abolish paying tax on empty offices, shops and factories.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Do the government realise they are crippling small businesses with astronomical rates bills on empty properties. We have tried to let our offices for "Free", and because the high car parking and rates charges we cannot find any tenants. We are now in the process of demolishing the building. Perfectly good buildings are going to be demolished because landlords cannot afford to pay the crippling taxes.

rejection.details: This petition ovelaps with several already in existence:  http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/EMPTY-RATES/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
